"About Jet Boots Gear":
"When you learn the skill \"Jet Boots Gear\", a Gear Gauge is added to the top of the Weapon Palette.

The Gear Gauge fills when you hit enemies with Jet Boots attacks and when you charge Techniques."

"Filling the Gear Gauge boosts the range and power of normal attacks, and gives them a special effect based on your weapon's element. It also boosts PA power.

In addition, charging a Technique will temporarily change the element of your Jet Boots to that Technique's element."
